text.style: font-family: Barriecito; font-size: 150px; text-anchor: middle; white-space: pre; opacity: 0.9;

tspan.style: font-family: 'Aguafina Script'; font-size: 87px; text-decoration: overline solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);

rect.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 31px;
